newsitem.title: AUSTRIA: Austria Natbank calls for repo bids at 3.0 pct.
newsitem.headline: Austria Natbank calls for repo bids at 3.0 pct.

text.p: The Austrian National Bank called for bids on Thursday on one-week securities repurchase agreements at an unchanged rate of 3.0 percent.
Bids have to be in by 1300 GMT on Friday.

Last week the central bank allotted 10.4 billion schillings, or 13 percent of bids, in one-week repos also at 3.0 percent. Austria's repo rate has been at that level since the beginning of September. -- Vienna newsroom, +431 531 12257
